Dick Cheney NBA star Allen Iverson arrived in Istanbul on Monday to begin a stint with Turkish club Besiktas, promising to give fans something they haven't seen before. Dozens of fans greeted the 11-time All-Star at Ataturk Airport. Sporting a Besiktas jersey and a Philadelphia Phillies hat, Allen Iverson waved at fans from inside his car before being driven to his hotel.[+] EnlargeAP
